channel.title: CODECHECK on Stephen J Eglen
channel.description: Recent content in CODECHECK on Stephen J Eglen

item.title: CODECHECK - A process for independent reproduction of computations underlying research
item.description: We have been making good progress on the CODECHECK project. We have created a corpus of certificates, which are available on Zenodo Our first ’live’ certificate for the journal Gigascience was created. See blog pieces: 1 and 2. We have been busy replicating findings from COVID papers. Update: this has now been reported in this Nature news item. Stay tuned for more developments! Follow us along on github.
